channel.title: ** Compile, and Run help! **
channel.description:
Okay, last night. I think I downloaded jdk right. All I did was download the latest version. http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp The first one on that site. After I install it. What do I do after that? Do I leave it alone? Because I am starting my own server, using Homiescape source. BUT. It keeps telling system cannot find blah blah blah... And I can't figure out why. I changed the 5.0_17 to 6.0_14. Idk if that's right. But I need more help. How do I find the jdk file? If I didn't download it right. This is what I have in my compile thing.
[code]@echo off COLOR 09 title Element Scape echo ------------------------- echo Cmon.. Compile.. Cmon.. echo ------------------------- "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause cls COLOR 06 echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo W00T DONE echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [/code]
And this is what I have in my run thing.
[code] @echo off color 0a title Element Scape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-6.0.14-ga-bin.jar server pause [/code]
Please, keep posting on here. I really need help. It's really complicating. Or can someone help me through teamviewer? All help appreciated.

item.title: ** Compile, and Run help! **
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

lildude783:

yo diluted… i can help u… i would teamview u? but im busy today… meet me on forums tomoz morning and i can help u a lil bit

(: This java thing is pissing me off. Hurry![br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2009, 03:31:54 pm[/size][hr][quote=“johno2, post:11, topic:284394”]@echo off
title Compile
cd Source
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\Bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*java
pause

should work.[/quote]

I will try this, and get back to this topic and tell you my results. If this doesn’t work. Will like, a compiling tool work? All purpose or something.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2009, 05:06:55 pm[/size][hr][quote=“johno2, post:11, topic:284394”]@echo off
title Compile
cd Source
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\Bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*java
pause

should work.[/quote]

Nope, it didn’t work. But thanks for the help. Can anyone else help me?

Read full topic

pause

and this for ur run

cd Source/Bin
title Project 317
java server
pause

change the last number of the jdk to your version of jdk[/quote]

I did, and it said cannot find path specified twice. And the run one said the same thing with java isn’t recognized blah blah blah. Omg, why is this so hard!

it will give you the right file.

hope this helps!
Johno[/quote]

I don’t know how. It says I have versino 6 update 6? I need a control tool. Someone with teamviewer to help me via computer.

item.title: ** Compile, and Run help! **
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:3, topic:284394”]compiler -

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

run server -

@echo off

java -Xmx800M server

pause

Give any errors which you come across[/quote]

Compile one sais I don’t have java. Then brings me to that site. The run one says javac isn’t recognized as an internal or external command. :}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2009, 12:33:15 pm[/size][hr][quote=“johno2, post:5, topic:284394”]Did you install jdk?

To find your jdk version goto

C:/Program Files/java[/quote]

Okay, I found the file. But I get this.

How do I see my version? Or something. I need serious help. Teamviewer would help. x] Or more information.

Read full topic

@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

jman7:

lol… you have to redo your compile and edit to make it for your version of jdk or jre…

item.title: ** Compile, and Run help! **
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

compiler -

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

run server -

@echo off

java -Xmx800M server

pause

Give any errors which you come across

Read full topic

item.title: ** Compile, and Run help! **
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

Okay, last night. I think I downloaded jdk right. All I did was download the latest version.
http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
The first one on that site. After I install it. What do I do after that? Do I leave it alone?
Because I am starting my own server, using Homiescape source. BUT. It keeps telling system cannot find blah blah blah…
And I can’t figure out why. I changed the 5.0_17 to 6.0_14. Idk if that’s right. But I need more help.
How do I find the jdk file? If I didn’t download it right. This is what I have in my compile thing.

@echo off COLOR 09 title Element Scape echo ------------------------- echo Cmon.. Compile.. Cmon.. echo ------------------------- "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause cls COLOR 06 echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo W00T DONE echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

And this is what I have in my run thing.

@echo off
color 0a
title Element Scape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-6.0.14-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Please, keep posting on here. I really need help. It’s really complicating. Or can someone help me through teamviewer?
All help appreciated.
